Author: dannyv
Title: Sam Altman of Loopt is #4 on Inc.com's Top 30 Entrepreneurs Under 30

Author: vegashacker
Content: well, roommate is also a girlfriend.  and it's "pushing one bedroom" ... but yeah, it's a studio.  :)

Author: ivankirigin
Content:
HA!

I don't have $4M to put in the bank. But I do have a comfortable income. My goal would be to work on interesting problems without needing a paycheck.

Things like financial planners, grocery delivery, and cleaning services are all excellent value for the amount of time they save.

Author: euccastro
Content: Sorry, I was just being silly.  For me money means mainly time.  In your situation, where most of your time goes to your business anyway, I think I'd only 'outsource' time consuming tasks that I don't enjoy doing (e.g., cleaning, laundry) so I can do more of what I enjoy (e.g., reading).
